trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_SEQ_00<tab>Tataru has a request for you.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_SEQ_01<tab>Tataru asks that you meet her at the Diamond Forge within Rowena's House of Splendors. Though she neglects to explain the nature of her business there, she assures you it will not take long...

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_SEQ_02<tab>After being ambushed by the Diamond Forge artisans and their measuring tapes, you are called to attend a meeting with your fellow Scions at the Rising Stones. There, you discuss the future of the organization, only to be interrupted by the arrival of M'naago, a member of the Ala Mhigan Resistance. Between pained gasps, the wounded woman reports that one of the Resistance leaders─a masked man known as the Griffin─has embarked upon a course which will inevitably drag the Eorzean Alliance into conflict with the Empire. Hearing this, Y'shtola bids you bear word of the looming threat to Ishgard while she and the others notify the rest of the Alliance leaders. You resolve to bring the matter before Lucia at the Temple Knights' headquarters.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_SEQ_03<tab>Lucia dutifully communicates the Scions' concerns to Ser Aymeric, and the lord commander soon agrees to send an envoy to the Alliance council. The nature of Ishgard's politics, however, requires that he first consult with his counterpart in the House of Commons to decide who will serve as the nation's representative. For the moment, there is little you can do but wait for the decision to be made...
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TODO_00<tab>Wait for Tataru at the Diamond Forge.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lucia at the Congregation of Our Knights Most Heavenly.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_001<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, just the hero I wanted to see! Would you mind doing me a small favor?
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_002<tab>I need you to meet me at the Diamond Forge. This won't take long, I promise!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_005<tab>You're familiar with Rowena's House of Splendors, aren't you? Wait for me at the Diamond Forge and I'll be along shortly!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_YDA_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_YDA_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_010<tab>I'm sorry to drag you away from your duties, but as I said, this won't take long! I just need you to stand perfectly still for a few moments...
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_100_010<tab>Right, everyone! Ready to go to work?
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_011<tab>No squirming now! Oh, and you might want to close your eyes...
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_012<tab>Hee hee hee hee!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_013<tab>There! All finished! The Warrior of Light's every measurement, from heroic head to intrepid toe!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_014<tab>...Well, wouldn't you like to know! All in good time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! All in good time!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_YDA_000_015<tab>A-ha! Found you!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_YDA_000_016<tab>Alphinaud wants everyone in the solar for a meeting. I don't know what it's about, but he seemed to think it was very important.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_TATARU_000_017<tab>Go on, we have everything we need. No sense in keeping everyone waiting!
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_YDA_000_010<tab>I hate leaving Naago like this, but I know Krile and Tataru will take good care of her...

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_PAPALYMO_000_015<tab>After conferring with Y'shtola, we have decided to focus our attentions on the East Shroud. Someone needs to keep an eye on the border, not to mention the <var 1A 02 /var>sylphs<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_FYRBRYDA_100_010<tab>Your measurements were rather larger than I expected.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_FYRBRYDA_100_011<tab>And no, I shan't tell you which ones.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_EGINOLF_100_015<tab>If Rowena has the gaze of a dead-eyed serpent, then Tataru's stare is alike to a raptor what's sighted prey. Each is bloody terrifyin' in her own way.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_LUCIA_000_020<tab>Greetings, Warrior of Light. What business brings you to Ishgard?
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_LUCIA_000_021<tab>...I see. Wait here. I will summon Ser Aymeric.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_022<tab>It is good to see you, my friend. 'Tis but a pity it must be under such circumstances. Had Lucia not informed me of the urgency of your suit, I would certainly have sent for some wine.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_023<tab>But to business. I thank you for bringing these developments in Ala Mhigo to our attention. Ishgard will of course send an envoy to attend the council in Gridania.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_024<tab>I cannot say who will represent us, however, as the choice is not mine to make─not mine alone, at any rate.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_025<tab>Given the imminence of the threat, we may forgo the formalities of a full assembly, but I will still need to consult my counterpart in the House of Commons prior to proceeding. Will you permit me some time to make the necessary arrangements?
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_026<tab>I thank you.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_027<tab>Our representative, whomever we select, will require a suitable escort. Make your preparations, and inform Ser Handeloup that he is to lead in your absence.
TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_LUCIA_000_028<tab>Yes, Lord Commander.

TEXT_HEAVNF101_02351_AYMERIC_000_029<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─pray accompany Lucia to the Gates of Judgement and make ready to depart for Gridania. I will have our envoy join you as soon as I can. Fury speed you on your way.
